A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi defies all expectations. It’s a movie about outgrowing black and white viewpoints\, recognizing failure as a valuable learning opportunity and boys leaning how to act like men. The blowback is very telling. Go in with no preconceived notions of what it should be and prepare to still be surprised. It’s way better on your second viewing once the shock has worn off. I loved this movie.
